newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia closes, opens coffee registrations.
newsitem.headline: Colombia closes, opens coffee registrations.

text.p: Colombia's National Federation of Coffee Growers announced registrations for November coffee shipments by private exporters would close Nov 29.
In a brief statement the organization said registration for January and February shipments by private and federation exporters would open Dec 2.
Private exporters will be authorized toship 1,620,000 60-kilo bags in January through March, and federation exporters will be allowed to ship 1,08p,000 60-kilo bags, according to the statement.
